document_data.name: Raelaryn Xorlarrin
document_data.History: Raelaryn invited his cousin, [[Hoshtar Xorlarrin]], to meet with the Council in the compound of the fallen [[House Srune'Lett]] in [[Narbondellyn]]. During the meeting, he and the other elder present were assassinated by a member of the [[Jaezred Chaulssin]] to start a civil war.
